Demos: conquest.p This program didn't appear at all in lecture, but I wrote it beforehand while playing around with enumerated data types, and it has some nice examples of doing things with them and 2-d arrays. You should be comfortable with the material in Chapters 1, 2, 3 (Sections 3.1-3.4 only), 4, 5, 6, and Sections 11.1-11.4 and 12.1 and 12.2 in the book.
